title: 新版東華e學苑討論區(公告)寄信方式
content:
分類： 行政公告
來源： 教學卓越中心 - 王立凡 - lfwang@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話8906422
對象： 全校教職員_全校學生
標題： 新版東華e學苑討論區(公告)寄信方式
日期： Tue, 10 Sep 2024 09:25:27 +0800

親愛的師生您好

東華e學苑目前寄送討論區通知(公告)方式有3種

    1. 無摘要(每次張貼就發送一封郵件)
    2. 完整(每天一封，包含完整內容)
    3. 主題(每天一封，只包含主題)

系統目前預設為"無摘要"，每則消息將以單封email方式寄送，如需更改方式可點選右上角頭像->偏好->討論區偏好->電子郵件摘要型式，選擇想要的寄送方式。

如需即時收到課程內的公告消息，建議維持"無摘要"的選項，才能立刻收到消息。

Currently, there are three ways to send forum notifications (announcements) on  e-Learning. These include:

    1. No digest (single email per forum post)
    2. Complete (daily email with full posts)
    3. Subjects (daily email with subjects only)

The system is currently set to "No digest", where each message is sent via a single email. To change the method, click on the profile picture in the upper right corner -> Preferences -> Forum preferences -> Email digest type, and choose the desired sending method.

If you wish to receive course announcements immediately, it is recommended to keep the option as "No digest" in order to receive messages immediately.
